channel.title: news on Alexandry AUGUSTIN, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in news on Alexandry AUGUSTIN, PhD

item.title: Paper on Twitter
item.description: Our paper titled “Open-domain Topic Identification of Out-of-domain Utterances using Wikipedia” has been featured on Twitter by @WikiResearch. Check it out!

item.title: The impact of therapeutic inertia on long-term blood pressure control: a Monte Carlo simulation study
item.description: Happy to announce that our paper titled “The impact of therapeutic inertia on long-term blood pressure control: a Monte Carlo simulation study” has been accepted to Journal of Hypertension.

item.title: Human in the Loop Dialogue Systems
item.description: Happy to announce that our paper titled “Open-domain Topic Identification of Out-of-domain Utterances using Wikipedia” has been accepted to Human in the Loop Dialogue Systems workshop at NeurIPS 2020.

item.title: Wellcome Broadening Horizons Menteeship programme
item.description: Excited to have been accepted to the Wellcome Broadening Horizons Menteeship programme which support early-career researchers in translating their research for impact on health by connecting mentees with mentors from industry.
